title: NA LCS Standings - Error
body: Someone please tell lolesports to fix their NA LCS Standings. According them TSM are first with 23W and 4L and Cloud 9 are second with 22W and 5L.

replies.body: I will buy a sold out ticket for April 19th for $30 if anyone is willing
Ya, we C9 fans have been waiting for weeks to see C9 on top again, it's a bummer seeing the wrong team awarded the win.
